    • ConfigurationImpl

      public ConfigurationImpl​(Configurator configurator)
      Creates a new empty configuration.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Tests if the configuration is complete and valid. A valid configuration is a complete configuration where all requirements are satisfied and there are no incompatibilities.
      Specified by:
      isValid in interface Configuration
      Returns:
      true if the configuration is valid, false otherwise.

    • isComplete

      public boolean isComplete()
      Tests if the configuration is complete, i.e. all categories have been configured.
      Specified by:
      isComplete in interface Configuration
      Returns:
      true if the configuration is complete, false otherwise.

    • getSelectedParts

      public java.util.Set<Part> getSelectedParts()
      Returns selected parts.
      Specified by:
      getSelectedParts in interface Configuration
      Returns:
      Set of selected parts (immutable)

    • selectPart

      public void selectPart​(Part chosenPart)
      Select a part. If a part was already selected for chosenPart's category, it is replaced by the new part.
      Specified by:
      selectPart in interface Configuration
      Parameters:
      chosenPart - Part to select

    • getSelectionForCategory

      public java.util.Optional<Part> getSelectionForCategory​(Category category)
      Returns selected part of given category.
      Specified by:
      getSelectionForCategory in interface Configuration
      Parameters:
      category - Category
      Returns:
      On optional containing the selected part for given category, or an empty optional if no part was selected.

    • unselectPartType

      public void unselectPartType​(Category categoryToClear)
      Clear a category, i.e. remove selected part for this category. If no parts are selected, nothing happens.
      Specified by:
      unselectPartType in interface Configuration
      Parameters:
      categoryToClear - Category to clear

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clear all the configuration, i.e. remove all selected parts.
      Specified by:
      clear in interface Configuration
